page.title: 02APPALOOSA STUD
page.content: My friend and I went to interview Miss De Rivaz at Icomb. Miss De Rivaz's mother and father own the stud farm, where they breed Appaloosa Horses. Their address is Ash Cottage, Icomb, Stow-on-the-Wold GLOS. She told us that they owned 15 acres. While she took us around the stables she told us that she took part in dressage competitions. She also told us that she sold some of her horses abroad to such places as Africa, Australia and India. Appaloosa foals look mostly like palomino but as they grow older they have more and more spots.Some Appaloosa foals are born spotty and as they get older some of them go very very spotty.Appaloosa horses are white all over with brown spots or black spots or some are brown all over with a white bottom and brown spots.
